skills.name: Flying Cards
skills.description: Throws a sharp card to attack and disturbs the enemy's HP recovery for 2 turns with a 70% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skills.name: Surprise Box
skills.description: Summons a surprise box that inflicts damage and grants1 random weakening effect among Stun, Glancing Hit Rate Increase, and Attack Speed Decrease to all enemies.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Revival Magic (Passive)
skills.description: Revives with invincibility and Immunity for 1 turn at the moment of death with 25% HP. [Automatic Effect]
skills.level_progress_description:
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Immunity
skill_effect.description: Monster is immune to all negative status effects

skill_effect.name: Invincible
skill_effect.description: All incoming damage is reduced to zero
